title: Acting Like a Bunch of Draculas in V Rising
description:
This week, we're chatting about an up-and-comer on the Steam charts — the vampire survival sim V Rising. Find out why we're so smitten; with special guest Travis McElroy!

Games discussed: V Rising, Everquest TLP, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus, Vampire Survivors, Stardew Valley
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
